meanings.definition: To install software or equipment before it is sold or used.
meanings.sent1: The company preinstalls the necessary software on all new computers.
meanings.sent2: He always preinstalls the latest updates on his phone to save time later.
meanings.sent3: The tech-savvy robot preinstalls its own upgrades while we sleep.
meanings.sent4: She preinstalls positivity in her mind every morning to start the day right.
meanings.sent5: The chef preinstalls the ingredients for tomorrow's recipe to be ready in advance.
